name: Cartoon Violets 4
description:
You play as a Homocidal Cyborg Mutant on your goal to kill; Men, women, Children and Terrorists. 

Interact with a backtown American street with your weapons of death.

You can interact and read any piles of papers you can find on the street.

Not recommended if easily offended.

this is also a prototype and accept any constructive critsism.
